alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Goliad County through 815 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms 7 miles south of Weesatche, or 7 miles northwest of Goliad. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad and Charco. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 634 and 644. US Highway 59 between mile markers 664 and 672. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
